entries.m_greet: Hey you, I need some help here. I'm in the business of, shall we say, relocating merchandise. I've got some Imps hot on my trail. Think you can lend me a hand?
entries.a_greet: Stand aside. We are here to eliminate this criminal. He has been wanted for smuggling contraband items across the galaxy. We've finally tracked him down to here.
entries.m_yes: Thanks, good to know there are still people who will help a guy out of a sticky situation.
entries.m_no: Fine. Then you may want to stay clear of here. Blaster bolts are gonna fly.
entries.m_thank_combat: Nice fighting. I'm glad I could count on you to help me out of that scrap.
entries.a_greet_rebel: Stand aside, we are only after this smuggler.
entries.a_greet_imperial: Stand aside. We are here to eliminate this criminal. He has been wanted for smuggling contraband items across the galaxy. We've finally tracked him down to here.
entries.m_maybe: Look, unless you want to get involved here, people are gonna die.
entries.a_no: You must be one of his drop-off contacts. Looks like we got here at the right time. Get them!
entries.a_maybe: We will let him go this time if he provides the name of his contact on Nar Shaddaa.
entries.a_no_negotiate: He's been evading capture for long enough. We're going to make certain he doesn't escape again.
entries.m_will_negotiate: My contact? Sure, that Hutt owes me so much money I'd love for it to get some more Imperial heat. My contact's name is Embra.
entries.m_no_negotiate: And go from one death sentence to worse than death sentence. I think not.
entries.a_decline_offer: We know his contracted ended with Embra the Hutt months ago. That was his last chance. Attack!
entries.a_accept_offer: That's the information we needed. However, if we catch him smuggling again there won't be an opportunity to talk his way out.
entries.m_negotiate_greet: Well, what's it going to be?
entries.response_negotiate: Wait, this doesn't have to end in violence.
entries.m_thank_negotiate: Well I was all prepared for a fight. I guess I should thank you for getting me out of that jam.
entries.m_waiting: I think I hear them. Get ready.
entries.m_greet_a: Easy now, I'm sure we can come to some sort of agreement, gentlemen.
entries.a_respond_m_1: We are not here to negotiate. You are not escaping this time.
entries.a_thank_combat: You've done well in helping us eliminate that smuggler.
entries.a_thank_negotiate: You've helped us gather important information here today.
entries.minion_1: We've chased him for long enough now.
entries.minion_2: That smuggler has evaded us for the last time.
entries.minion_4: I'll make sure he doesn't have an escape route.
entries.a_greet_mad: Watch out, there's more than one of them.
entries.a_negotiate_fail: This smuggler has wasted too much of our time already.
entries.a_tired_waiting: He's going to fire. Take him down!
entries.m_saved: Once again, I survive to see another day. Something tells me my luck can't hold out forever. Maybe I should give up smuggling and try a safer line of work. Naw.
entries.m_betrayed: You're helping the Imperials?! You're funeral, pal.
entries.m_sorry: What are you looking at me for? I'm out of here.
